# itemString

**Instance Property**

The transcript of the list item, excluding the list marker.

## Declaration

```swift
var itemString: String { get }
```

## Inspecting an item

- **content**: The content of the list item.
- **markerString**: The list marker as a string.
- **markerType**: The style of the list marker.
